item.title: Rem, our Chatbot, is Now Online!
item.dc:creator: Dale Bartolome
item.description:
We are glad to announce that Reminiscent’s Facebook Page and Messenger is now 24/7 online. Through hard work and dedication, we were able to create

The post Rem, our Chatbot, is Now Online! appeared first on Reminiscent.
item.content:encoded:
We are glad to announce that Reminiscent’s Facebook Page and Messenger is now 24/7 online. Through hard work and dedication, we were able to create Rem. She will stand as Reminiscent’s Chatbot who will be in our frontlines to help you, our customers, with regards to your inquiries and concerns involving our products and other services we could possibly provide.

To experience Rem’s service, click here.

If you’re interested in Rem’s story, feel free to browse below.

Who is Rem? Why her?

Rem is a character from the anime “Re:Zero.” She is a young, hardworking maid who upholds respect and high standards for quality of work and service. We chose her to represent and take care of Reminiscent while we are away since we deeply trust her capabilities and personality.

How is Rem connected to Reminiscent?

Rem has a strong sense of smell. In the anime, Rem was able to smell the witch’s scent on Subaru even from a distance. I (Dale, founder of Reminiscent) believe that I relate to Rem on that aspect.

Reminiscent’s brand name origin composes of three important words. (and even Rem’s name)

  • Reminiscent, which means tending to remind one of something. A fascination of the past caused by real-time experiences.
  • Mini, which is a synonym for small. This describes the decant bottles that we use.
  • Scent, which pertains to the fragrances we decant.

How can I experience Rem’s service?

Just check us out on Facebook Messenger and click on ‘Get Started’ or ‘Chat with Rem’. Rem would be glad to serve you your needs with regards to Reminiscent’s mini scents. If you ever encounter technical issues with Rem, or even suggestions and feedback, feel free to type a free-form message. We highly appreciate these and immediately address these types of concerns.

Thank you very much for your support! We wish you to stay confident at all times and smell great.

The post Rem, our Chatbot, is Now Online! appeared first on Reminiscent.

item.title: Our New Website is Now Live!
item.dc:creator: Dale Bartolome
item.description:
After months of hard work and dedication, we are excited to officially announce the launch of our website! Come check us out at reminiscent.ml Our

The post Our New Website is Now Live! appeared first on Reminiscent.
item.content:encoded:
After months of hard work and dedication, we are excited to officially announce the launch of our website! Come check us out at reminiscent.ml

Our website offers our viewers a user-friendly, easy to navigate fresh new website, allowing our viewers to easily browse for our available fragrance decants and information about fragrances in general.

We are constantly updating our content with new offerings, products, special announcements, news and events, useful articles, and discounts or promo vouchers you can use in shopping through Reminiscent’s Shopee Page.

We hope you enjoy our website! For any questions, suggestions, feedback or comments, please leave us a message through Messenger. m.me/reminiscent.ml

The post Our New Website is Now Live! appeared first on Reminiscent.
